thread.title: U.S. Government Bonds Rally as Stocks Tumble

author: Daniel Kruger
title: U.S. Government Bonds Rally as Stocks Tumble

organizations.name: u.s. government bonds rally as stocks tumble

text:
U.S. government bonds rallied Monday, sending the yield on the benchmark 10-year Treasury note to its biggest one-day decline in five months, as investors dumped stocks and bought assets perceived as safe.
The yield on the benchmark 10-year U.S. Treasury note fell to 2.794%, according to Tradeweb, from 2.852% Friday, marking its largest one-day fall since September. Yields fall as bond prices rise.
